{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3296409,"name":"Gal","username":"GalDotan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/galdotan/{size}/201749_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-28T16:18:20.515Z","cooked":"

We have a neo motor connected to a spark max on our elevator, The elevator has 3 neos on it. In the past day, on off them started to blink in all different colours and intervals in seemingly random times.

Things we checked:
Replacing spark max
Checking the data cable to the neo
We tried connecting a neo in free air and it worked
The power and can to the spark looks fine
Battery is fine

GalDotan:

on off them started to blink in all different colours and intervals in seemingly random times.

I have seen this when there is a can bus issue. Check the spark max can cables, your termination resistor. Do you see any can bus errors in your driver station log?
